biography:
ACBC is based in Milan, Italy, was born from a Kickstarter in 2017 and now counts more than 50,000 users and 12 flagship stores.
We feel responsible for our beautiful planet, and sustainability is core to the ACBC adventure. Thanks to our patented technology you can create three, five, 17 shoes with just one sole and reduce the environmental footprint and plastic impact of owning multiple footwear. 
MIT researchers have discovered that a shoe accounts for 13.5 kg of CO2. 25 Billion shoes produced every year create pollute as much as 80 million cars.
Researchers have discovered that the bulk of emissions come from the sole’s injection moulding process. As MIT researcher Kirchain explains: You have a lot of effort going into the molding of the material, but you’re only getting a very small part out of that process.Join the zip shoe and help us change the world of footwear!
